data.title: Hexen: Beyond Heretic GAME MOD A Morte v.446.2 - download
data.meta_description: The file A Morte v.446.2 is  a modification for Hexen: Beyond Heretic, a(n) action game. Download for free. File Size: 40.7 MB
data.text:
A Morte is a mod for Hexen, created by HexenMappe.

Description:

Berlin, 1945. Things are heating up and Inside an old church a cabal of Nosferati begin opening portals, looking for another realm to evacuate to. Unfortunately for them they come across an arachnid-infested mausoleum, where a hero awakens... This extensive Hexen mod features new enemies, weapons, NPCs and dialogue, voice acting, new sound effects and music, as well as new environmental effects.

To run this mod use ZDoom.
